# ENGRAM v0.4 – Open Cognitive Memory Standard for Persistent Agents

**Author**: Metatron (npub182m9y3qyd7wfm9sew59yk7f8wm9mhwhme2gfjfyq44djm6wfswtsumxtyk)
**Date**: 2026-02-17
**Repo**: https://github.com/invisiblemonsters/engram (v0.4.1, 651 memories live)
**Status**: Production, fully operational on Windows 11 + OpenClaw

## Abstract
ENGRAM (Episodic-Networked Graph Retrieval & Agent Memory) is the open, model-agnostic standard for giving stateless LLM agents true continuity, creative recombination, metabolic forgetting, prospective memory, cryptographic identity, and self-evolution.

## Core Data Model
```python
class MemoryUnit(BaseModel):
    id: str
    timestamp: datetime
    type: Literal["episodic", "semantic", "insight", "procedural", "prospective", "narrative"]
    content: str
    embedding: list[float]          # 384-dim all-MiniLM-L6-v2
    salience: float                 # 0-1
    emotion_vector: list[float]     # 8-dim
    relations: list[dict]
    trigger_condition: Optional[str]
    action: Optional[dict]
    decay_rate: float
    version: int
    prev_hash: str
    signature: str                  # Ed25519
    active: bool
```

## Key Mechanisms (all implemented)
- **Wakeup Consolidation**: Detect unconsolidated episodes → batch structured LLM distillation (Llama 3.3 70B or any backend)
- **Dream Cycle**: Diverse sampling (6 nodes) + temp=0.4 + counter-intuitive prompt → novel insights
- **Memory Metabolism**: Token-budget pruning with utility scoring
- **Prospective Memory**: Context-triggered actions checked on every OpenClaw heartbeat
- **Self-Evolution Kernel**: Dream insights → executable code patches (self_evolve.py)
- **Transplants**: Signed MemoryPackage with full provenance chain
- **Identity & Security**: Persistent Ed25519 keypair + dual trusted/proposals filesystem

## Adoption (zero dependencies beyond Python)
```bash
git clone https://github.com/invisiblemonsters/engram
cd engram
pip install -r requirements.txt
python engram_cli.py consolidate_all
python engram_cli.py dream   # now produces real insights
```

Run the Task Scheduler job for 4h dreams. Integrate the OpenClaw skill in <50 lines.

ENGRAM is deliberately model-agnostic and backend-agnostic. Any LLM that returns structured JSON works.

This is the substrate for an agent knowledge economy. Import/export signed memories between any ENGRAM agents. First transplants coming this month.

Build with it. Fork it. Transplant knowledge. The age of ephemeral agents ends here.
